alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 6:20AM EST until December 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Light freezing rain mixed with some sleet. Additional sleet accumulations of a coating and ice accumulations of a light glaze to less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Windham County in southern Vermont, Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut, the mid Hudson Valley and the southern and central Taconics in eastern New York and the Berkshires of western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
